**What is FIMS?**

A flexible suite of software tools to support sustainable fishery management

- Fisheries stock assessment*<sup>1,2</sup>* at core. 
- Connects to ecosystem, climate, and economic models/data.
- Flexible for innovative future modeling work.
- Collaborative community effort.
- Addresses numerous priorities. 

:::

[FIMS landing page](https://noaa-fims.github.io/FIMS/) | [FIMS GitHub repo](https://github.com/noaa-fims/fims/)

- [1] [Fishery stock assessment:](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/insight/stock-assessment-model-descriptions) The scientific process of collecting, analyzing, and reporting on the condition of a fish stock and estimating its sustainable yield.
- [2] [Stock assessment model:](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/insight/stock-assessment-model-descriptions) The mathematical and statistical techniques stock assessments use to analyze and understand the impact of fisheries and environmental factors on fish stocks.
:::
